snippet: Wayne Rooney scored twice in United’s 2-1 win over Sunderland, though his performance was overshadowed after the referee appeared to eject the wrong player in the second half.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Manchester United defeats Sunderland, 2-0; other soccer results and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney scored twice in United’s 2-1 win over Sunderland, though his performance was overshadowed after the referee appeared to eject the wrong player in the second half.

headline.main: Sunderland Player’s Foul Dooms His Team, and a Teammate, After Referee’s Error
headline.print_headline: Sunderland Player’s Foul Dooms His Team, and a Teammate, After Referee’s Error
